description.text: In the annals of time, our world bore no arcane whispers until a power-thirsty sovereign altered fate. The Dead King, driven by insatiable ambition, devoted labor and wealth to unravel the mysteries of magic. His relentless pursuit birthed aberrant creatures, casting an ominous pall over our once tranquil realm. Whispers persist that even in death, his corpse became a conduit for the very forces he sought to command. Beware, brave one, for the shadows of his obsession linger. As you tread deeper, know this: The Dead King awaits, his lifeless shell now a vessel for magic's malevolence. Prepare for a confrontation like no other!
